author: Joel Rebello
title: There could be some impact on credit cards, micro finance & SME loans: RBL CEO
description: Certainly there is an impact on micro finance because of the covid situation. Anyway we could not collect because this period was under moratorium and it has been pushed to June. Once lockdown lifts we will re-engage with these customers on an active basis, s…
content: RBL Bank is confident of a strong operating performance in the quarter ended March despite the volatility due to the covid19 crisis. The bank lost 8% of deposits in March due to withdrawals from state governments led by Maharashtra. In an interview with Joel … [+5936 chars]
